Title: Iron Will
Plot: Yinsen forces Chika to work on the arc reactor, before making his demands for the dissolution of the Armed Forces and National Diet. Nanami attempts to escape the hostage situation but is caught and thrown into a storage room. Tony is rescued by Sakurai and tries to contact Chika, but she is caught by Yinsen and throw into storage with Nanami.
